name: Without Honor
description:
Without Honor is a mobile (Android) video game set in a World War 2 like environment where you have to fight enemies to rescue your lost comrades. You have a wide array of weapons to use against the enemy troops. It offers a challenging experience where you can feel the claustrophobic ambience of trench warfare.

This game was my final project (kind of thesis) at my university. It was made to be show all my abilities to plan, model, animate, program and finished a video game. It's not really completed but was all I've done while I was studying.
